issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

assignee.name: myrna

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: BlobClob4BlobTest and LobStreamTest fail creating database due to NullPointerException  on weme 6.1

author.name: anurag
author.emailAddress: anurag dot shekhar at gmail dot com

comments.body: can it be because I have enabled BlobClob4BlobTest and LobStreamsTest to run with with encryption support and J2ME (WEME 6.1) doesn't have Security Provider ?
